data.message:
In a cofee shop wid friends!
A man attends a call on a MOBILE:
HELLO
Wife:
Darling I am shoping shall I buy 100,000 worth jewellery?
Man: sure buy it!
Wife: I have liked a silk saree worth 20,000 shall I?
Man: just 1 saree is not enough buy more!
Wife: OK dear ur credit card is wid me I am using it.
Man OK DEAR!
All the friends ask him have u gone mad or r u drunk? 
r u trying to show us how much u LOVE ur wife?
Man: wo sub choro yeh batao
.
.
.
yeh mobile kis ka hain.:P:P:P:P
